data.title: Latest news, transfers, pictures, video, opinion
data.meta_description: Aaron Ramsey started his career at hometown club Cardiff City and signed for Arsenal for £5million in 2008 but suffered a career-threatening leg break in 2010 against Stoke City. Ramsey has since returned to the Arsenal side and was made captain of Wales by the late Gary Speed.
data.text:
What happened to last Arsenal side who managed to avoid an Anfield Premier League defeat

Aaron Ramsey started his career at hometown club Cardiff City and signed for Arsenal for £5million in 2008 but suffered a career-threatening leg break in 2010 against Stoke City. Ramsey has since returned to the Arsenal side and was made captain of Wales by the late Gary Speed.
